synopsis.text:
When Patema, a young and adventurous princess from a subterranean civilization, defies the rules to explore forbidden zones in her vast network of tunnels, she stumbles upon a hidden secret that changes her life forever. After falling into an abyss, she finds herself in a topsy-turvy world on the surface, where gravity pulls her towards the sky. Age, a disillusioned student from the oppressive nation of Aiga, rescues her and challenges the propaganda that labels Patema and her people as sinners.

As they navigate their contrasting worlds, Patema and Age uncover the truth behind their origins, leading them on a heartwarming journey of friendship and understanding. In a society where curiosity is suppressed and conformity is enforced, these two teenagers must work together to bridge the gap between their worlds and overcome the forces that seek to keep them apart. Join Patema and Age as they embark on an unforgettable adventure that explores the power of unity and the importance of embracing differences.
